title: The Real Story of the Making of Nancy Pelosi
description:
A deathbed endorsement and the battle against a DSA insurgent launched a unique and powerful congressional career.

The post The Real Story of the Making of Nancy Pelosi appeared first on The Intercept.

title: How Scientists From the “Global South” Are Sidelined at the IPCC
description:
Researchers say systemic bias at the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change has led to projections that perpetuate economic inequality.

The post How Scientists From the “Global South” Are Sidelined at the IPCC appeared first on The Intercept.

title: “Fuck That”: How Street Protests and Youth Activism Brought Kenneth Mejia to Power in Los Angeles
description:
Kenneth Mejia, a housing justice activist and certified public accountant, was elected by channeling the energy of young protesters into electoral politics.

The post “Fuck That”: How Street Protests and Youth Activism Brought Kenneth Mejia to Power in Los Angeles appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Chuck Schumer Quietly Moving Lame-Duck $3 Billion Payout to Families of 9/11 Victims
description:
Schumer’s attempt at a rapid passage through unanimous consent would bypass debate on a payout using PPP money, angering families of Marines killed in Beirut bombing.

The post Chuck Schumer Quietly Moving Lame-Duck $3 Billion Payout to Families of 9/11 Victims appeared first on The Intercept.
